colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B (ZHES PA BLA MA MGON PO'I BKA' DRIN 'TSO BA'I BHU SU GU PA ^ DAM TSIG RDO RJES BRIS PA 'DIS KYANG @004A *, ,BDAG GZHAN THAMS CAD BLA MA MGON POS DUS RNAM KUN DUS 'BRAL BA MED PAR RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,) DE LTAR MYUR  MDZAD YE SHES KYI MGON PO'I CHE BA KHYAD PAR GYI THUGS BSKYED TSUL DANG, ,RJE BTZUN 'JAM DBYANGS KYIS RJE BLA MA DANG, ,GRUB CHEN MEE TRI BAS KHYUNG PO DANG, ,MGON PO NYID KYIS DPAL SHA WA RI PA LA GSUNGS PA RNAMS DANG, ,MGON DKAR GYI CHE BA KHYUNG PO'I SGRUB YIG SOGS SU BYUNG RNAMS TSIGS SU BCAD PAR BSDEBS PA'I GSOL BA 'DEBS TSUL YIN NO, ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,BKRA SHIS DPAL BAR 'DZAM GLING DU RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,)
